FuncDef: This command manually reloads the certificate or key cache.
CLIs: reload type { cert | key | cert-key-pair } <filename> protocol <protocol> [ key-file <filename> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies what item will be reloaded.
Specifies that a certificate cache will be reloaded.
Specifies that a key cache will be reloaded.
Specifies that a paired certificate and key cache will be reloaded.
Specifies which protocol the certificate will be reloaded for. Values-ipsec, tls.
